name: 'loons
description: This game was made for the third Blackthornrpod game jam. The theme was less is more so we decided to make a game in which you have to loose balloons to start falling or gain balloons to slow done your fall and/or make yourself float up. The original idea was that you have to pop your balloons with arrows and if the arrow hit you died. Unfortunately due to time restrictions we weren't able to get the balloon mechanic work. This game was made by a team of 4.  Yatharth - lead programmer - 14 years old. Adoring games - artist - 11 years old. Starminer99 - programmer - 14 years old. Kogi/kojl - Musician - 17 years old. Leo_Close - programmer - 13 years old.  We were planning to add a story and a boss we already had animations for, but for time restrictions and school work we were not able to add it.
